content: stripey shorties inspired by confetti birthday cake these socks make for a fun addictive and quick summer project * worked with a mini heel flap and modified short row heel to give some extra room around the bridge of the foot * designed for women s medium us shoe sizes 7-9 * you will need size 0 2 mm dpns or circulars for the cuff and size 1 2 25 mm dpns or circulars for the main sock * use size 1 needles in foot/leg striped pattern to acheive gauge i used 5 mini skeins of a fingering weight merino/nylon blend called darlings from the knitting loft my lys in toronto ontario
